Villa Rica, GA Population by Age

The median age in Villa Rica, GA is 34.0, as per 2018-2022 ACS 5 -Year Estimates. Of the total population, 23% were under the age of 15, 20.42% aged 15 to 29, 46.71% aged 30 to 64, 9.46% aged 65 to 84, and 0.41% were 85 years of age and older.

By Neilsberg Research

Updated Jul 26, 2024

Villa Rica, GA population age distribution

A complete breakdown of Villa Rica's age demographics from 0 to 85 years, distributed across 18 age groups is listed in the table below.

FIGURE 1

Villa Rica, GA population by age group.

The largest age group is 10 to 14 years with a population of 1,587 (9.14% of the total population).

The largest age group in Villa Rica, GA was for the group of age 10 to 14 years with a population of 1,587 (9.14%), according to the 2018-2022 American Community Survey.

At the same time, the smallest age group in Villa Rica, GA was the 85 years and over with a population of 71 (0.41%).

Things to know

What is the population of Villa Rica, GA under 18?

Villa Rica's population under the age of 18 is 5,125, as per the latest U.S. Census Bureau's American Community Survey estimates. This population is 29.53% of the total resident population of Villa Rica, GA.

What is the aging population in Villa Rica, GA?

Villa Rica's population aged 65 years and above was 1,712. As per the U.S. Census Bureau's American Community Survey, this population is 9.87% of the entire population.

References

U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates

Villa Rica, GA Age Group Population Dataset: A Complete Breakdown of Villa Rica Age Demographics from 0 to 85 Years and Over, Distributed Across 18 Age Groups // 2024 Edition

Last updated July 24, 2024

About this dataset

Context

The dataset tabulates the Villa Rica population distribution across 18 age groups. It lists the population in each age group along with the percentage population relative of the total population for Villa Rica. The dataset can be utilized to understand the population distribution of Villa Rica by age. For example, using this dataset, we can identify the largest age group in Villa Rica.

Key observations

The largest age group in Villa Rica, GA was for the group of age 10 to 14 years years with a population of 1,587 (9.14%), according to the ACS 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates. At the same time, the smallest age group in Villa Rica, GA was the 85 years and over years with a population of 71 (0.41%). Source: U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates

Content

When available, the data consists of estimates from the U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates

Variables / Data Columns

Age Group: This column displays the age group in consideration

Population: The population for the specific age group in the Villa Rica is shown in this column.

% of Total Population: This column displays the population of each age group as a proportion of Villa Rica total population. Please note that the sum of all percentages may not equal one due to rounding of values.

Good to know

Margin of Error

Data in the dataset are based on the estimates and are subject to sampling variability and thus a margin of error. Neilsberg Research recommends using caution when presening these estimates in your research.

Villa Rica, GA Age Cohorts Dataset: Children, Working Adults, and Seniors in Villa Rica - Population and Percentage Analysis // 2024 Edition

Last updated July 24, 2024

About this dataset

Context

The dataset tabulates the Villa Rica population by age cohorts (Children: Under 18 years; Working population: 18-64 years; Senior population: 65 years or more). It lists the population in each age cohort group along with its percentage relative to the total population of Villa Rica. The dataset can be utilized to understand the population distribution across children, working population and senior population for dependency ratio, housing requirements, ageing, migration patterns etc.

Key observations

The largest age group was 18 to 64 years with a poulation of 10,517 (60.60% of the total population). Source: U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates.

Content

When available, the data consists of estimates from the U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates.

Age cohorts:

Under 18 years

18 to 64 years

65 years and over

Age Group: This column displays the age cohort for the Villa Rica population analysis. Total expected values are 3 groups ( Children, Working Population and Senior Population).

Population: The population for the age cohort in Villa Rica is shown in the following column.

Percent of Total Population: The population as a percent of total population of the Villa Rica is shown in the following column.

Villa Rica, GA Population Pyramid Dataset: Age Groups, Male and Female Population, and Total Population for Demographics Analysis // 2024 Edition

Last updated July 24, 2024

About this dataset

Context

The dataset tabulates the data for the Villa Rica, GA population pyramid, which represents the Villa Rica population distribution across age and gender, using estimates from the U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates. It lists the male and female population for each age group, along with the total population for those age groups. Higher numbers at the bottom of the table suggest population growth, whereas higher numbers at the top indicate declining birth rates. Furthermore, the dataset can be utilized to understand the youth dependency ratio, old-age dependency ratio, total dependency ratio, and potential support ratio.

Key observations

Youth dependency ratio, which is the number of children aged 0-14 per 100 persons aged 15-64, for Villa Rica, GA, is 34.3.

Old-age dependency ratio, which is the number of persons aged 65 or over per 100 persons aged 15-64, for Villa Rica, GA, is 14.7.

Total dependency ratio for Villa Rica, GA is 49.0.

Potential support ratio, which is the number of youth (working age population) per elderly, for Villa Rica, GA is 6.8.

Content

When available, the data consists of estimates from the U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) 2018-2022 5-Year Estimates.

Population (Female): The female population in the Villa Rica for the selected age group is shown in the following column.

Total Population: The total population of the Villa Rica for the selected age group is shown in the following column.
